Grand entry w/granite flooring & retractable crystal chandelier. It features 2 full kitchens loaded with custom built cabinetry, granite island & access to an oversized entertaining deck. Cross hall living & dining room. A total of 8 suites throughout the house. Mbdrm has spacious ensuite. Media room, recreation & dancing/exercise room down. HRV, air conditioning & central audio system. Don't miss it.

Public Remarks: This sleek and modern custom built 6,310 sq. ft. Nexus family home was inspired by the works of Frank Lloyd Wright and Charles R. Stinson. Designed with resort style living and entertaining in mind, the property sits on over 21,000 sq. ft. of beautifully landscaped gardens. Featuring multiple outdoor living areas with a family friendly tiled swimming pool, hot tub, fire pit and built in BBQ. Magnificent open concept chefs kitchen with exceptional appliances. Impressive master bedroom wing with ensuite and custom walnut walk in closet allow for privacy from the three additional oversized bedrooms each with ensuites and large closets. Close to UBC, Crofton, York and St. Georges. Catchment - Kerrisdale and Point Grey High School.

Public Remarks: Situated on 4.25 Acres with sought after exposures and views to the gulf islands. Stately Tudor inspired residence with a floor plan ideal for large scale entertaining and comfortable family living. Grand foyer, exceptionally spacious princ ipal rooms, exquisite woodwork and window treatments throughout, superb master suite, spacious help quarters are just a few features that make this estate property an ideal package for a sophisticated lifestyle! Impressive grounds with potential to create private sanctuary or recreational facilities on the lower level. Potential to further develop with additional residences for a true family estate. Carefully maintained by long time owners make this exceptional value on today's market.
